description: User can view list of all projects
steps: Verify list of projects is displayed
Verify each project shows name, location, and report count
Verify each project shows status indicator
Verify projects are sorted by most recent activity

description: User can create a new project
steps: Select location on map or enter address
Verify navigation to new project detail

description: User can set project location using current GPS
steps: Verify location permission prompt if not granted
Verify address is reverse-geocoded and displayed
Verify map preview shows correct location

description: User can set project location by searching address
steps: Verify map updates to show selected location

description: User can set project location by tapping map
steps: Tap on a location on the map
Verify marker appears at tapped location

description: User can view project details
steps: Tap on a project in the list
Verify project name is displayed in header
Verify location with map preview is shown
Verify list of reports for this project
Verify team members assigned to project

description: User can edit project details
steps: Verify edit form appears with current values
Verify updated values displayed on detail screen

description: User can delete a project
steps: Verify navigation back to Projects list
Verify deleted project no longer appears

description: User can search and filter projects
steps: Navigate to Projects screen with multiple projects
Verify list filters to matching projects
Verify filter options appear (status, date range)

description: User can view projects on a map
steps: Verify markers for all projects with locations

description: User can start a new report from project detail
steps: Verify report is in draft status
Add an entry to confirm report is linked

description: User can view all reports within a project
steps: Verify all reports for this project are listed
Verify each report shows title, date, status
Verify report count matches displayed list

description: Admin can assign team members to project
steps: Verify list of current team members
Verify user is added to project team
Verify user now appears in team list

description: Admin can remove team members from project
steps: Navigate to Project Detail with team members
Swipe left on a team member or tap remove button
Verify user is removed from team list

description: Field worker can only see assigned projects
steps: Verify only projects user is assigned to are visible
Verify projects user is not assigned to are not shown

description: User can view cached projects when offline

View several project details to cache them
Verify Project Detail shows cached data

description: User can create project while offline

steps: Verify validation error for project name

description: Project name has maximum length limit
steps: Verify input stops accepting characters at limit
Or verify validation error for exceeding limit

description: Project list supports pull-to-refresh

steps: Have more than 20 projects in the system
Verify initial batch of projects loads
Verify next batch of projects loads

Verify message explaining no projects exist
Verify 'Create First Project' button is prominent

Verify active projects show green indicator
Verify completed projects show different visual treatment
Verify projects with pending uploads show sync indicator

Verify project saved with pending sync status

steps: Verify each project name, location, status is read
